main_definition: In general, 'sheets' refers to a flat piece of material, but in an idiomatic context, it is often used to refer to paper or plastic sheets.

meanings_and_examples.example: Please print your document on regular sheets.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A flat, thin material for covering a bed or surface
meanings_and_examples.example: She changed the bedsheets every week to keep them clean and fresh.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In computing, multiple adjacent pages of data stored as a single unit
meanings_and_examples.example: The spreadsheet consisted of several sheets containing different types of information.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A large piece of paper used for drawing or writing, often with pre-printed lines and grids
meanings_and_examples.example: He sketched his design on a sheet of graph paper to ensure proper proportions.
